lead_paragraph: ROBINS--Cherry Balaban. On June 2nd, peacefully in San Francisco, surrounded by her family. Devoted wife of the late Harold Robins. Cherished mother of Anthony, Jessica and Donald, and loving mother-in-law of Susan, Peter and Kayko. Fiercely adored grandmother of Nina, Lucy, Caitlin, Joseph, Niki and Michael. Daughter of theatrical impresario A.J. Balaban and Carrie. Sister of Josie Couture and Bruce Balaban. Extraordinary and steadfast friend to all who were privileged to know her. A celebration of her life will take place in San Francisco. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROBINS, CHERRY BALABAN
